member.summary: Defines that all resources in a relation pointing to the same protocol, host and port are considered a link.

member.name: F:Heracles.LinksPolicy.AllHttp
member.summary: Defines that all non-blank HTTP/HTTPS resources in a relation are considered a link.

member.name: F:Heracles.LinksPolicy.All
member.summary: Defines that all non-blank resources in a relation are considered a link.
